mapper.sql: SELECT r.id, r.roleName, r.roleCode, r.status, r.description
mapper.select: FROM alq_permission_user_role ur INNER JOIN alq_permission_role r ON ur.roleID=r.id WHERE r.status = 0 and ur.userId=#{userId}

FROM alq_permission_role r WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY r.roleName DESC

SELECT u.id, u.userName, u.telphone, u.password, u.loginTime, u.createTime, u.isable FROM alq_permission_user_role ur INNER JOIN alq_permission_common_user u on ur.userId=u.id WHERE ur.roleId = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alq_permission_role ( `roleName`,description, `roleCode`, `status`, `createrId`, `updaterId`, `createTime`, `updateTime`, `creater_id`, `updater_id`) VALUES ( #{roleName},#{description}, #{roleCode}, #{status}, #{createrId}, #{updaterId}, now(), now(),#{createrId}, #{updaterId});
